code:
---
config:
  theme: base
  look: classic
---
flowchart TD
    A[Developer: Commit to Feature Branch] --> B[GitHub Actions: CI Pipeline]
    B --> C1[Build & Unit Tests - Maven]
    B --> C2[Static Analysis - SonarQube]
    B --> C3[SAST - Veracode]
    B --> C4[Secrets Scan - Gitleaks/Trivy FS]
    C1 & C2 & C3 & C4 --> D{All Checks Pass?}
    D -- Yes --> E[Ready for PR]
    D -- No --> F[Fail Fast - Notify Developer]
    F --> A
    G[PR Created to Main] --> H[GitHub Actions: PR Pipeline]
    H --> I[Build & Unit Tests - Maven]
    H --> J[SCA - Snyk]
    I & J --> K{Dependency/Test Fail?}
    K -- Yes --> L[PR Blocked - Fix Required]
    K -- No --> M[Docker Build & Push -> ECR]
    M --> N[Image Scan - Trivy + Cosign Sign]
    N --> O[Integration Tests - Testcontainers]
    O --> P[Deploy to Dev via ArgoCD]
    P --> Q[Automated Smoke Tests]
    Q --> R{Smoke Tests Pass?}
    R -- No --> S[Auto-Rollback - Notify Team]
    R -- Yes --> T[PR Merge Enabled]
    U[Merge to Main] --> V[GitHub Actions: CD Pipeline]
    V --> W[Deploy to UAT via ArgoCD]
    W --> X[Manual UAT Validation]
    X --> Y[Smoke & Contract Tests]
    Y --> Z{Manual Approval for Prod?}
    Z -- No --> AA[Deploy Halted]
    Z -- Yes --> AB[Deploy to Prod via ArgoCD Rollouts]
    AB --> AC[Canary/Blue-Green Deployment]
    AC --> AD[Post-Deploy Validation]
    AD --> AE[Metrics & Traces Collected]
    AE --> AF[Audit Logs to Central Store]
    AF --> AG[Deployment Success]
    classDef featureBranch fill:#000
    classDef prPipeline fill:#000
    classDef cdPipeline fill:#000
    classDef production fill:#000
    class A,B,C1,C2,C3,C4,D,E,F featureBranch
    class G,H,I,J,K,L,M,N,O,P,Q,R,S,T prPipeline
    class U,V,W,X,Y,Z,AA,AB,AC,AD,AE,AF,AG cdPipeline
    class AB,AC,AD,AE,AF,AG production
